verbs.description: WASHINGTON ( AP ) — The Latest on first lady Melania Trump ( all times local ) : 2:40 p.m. President Donald Trump [V: has] welcomed his wife home from the hospit

WASHINGTON ( AP ) — The Latest on first lady Melania Trump ( all times local ) : [ARGM-TMP: 2:40 p.m.] [ARG0: President Donald Trump] has [V: welcomed] [ARG1: his wife home] [ARGM-DIR: from the hospit]
